channel.title: UMW ACM PCG
channel.description: UMW ACM Programming Code Golf Challenge

item.title: Hole 1 Par 2
item.description:
• Goal: Output the current date.
  • Output Format: YYYY-MM-DD
  • Example Output: 2018-01-31

item.title: Hole 2 Par 2
item.description:
• Goal: Create an infinite loading animation. Infinitely cycle through the characters |, /, - and : every 0.25 seconds, overwrite the last one with the next in the sequence. Or just rewrite the whole line.
  • Output Format:

item.title: Rules
item.description: The purpose of code golf is to create a program that solves a problem in the least amount of characters possible. A character counts as 1 byte and includes whitespace characters. The person with the smallest number of bytes wins.

item.title: Rules
item.description: Judging is done on slack and solutions will be visible to anyone. You may continue to edit your solution until the end of the contest. Simply format your post to the #PCG channel in this format (Replace brackets with your values. Place your code inside the backticks.):
